name: Destiny's Faith
description:
A JRPG style game I made using RPG Maker Vx Ace. Inspired by my lifelong love of the genre.

Mysterious undead and beasts suddenly roam freely. The daughter of a legendary hero is tasked with healing the land and solving it's mysteries. A routine day of training leads to the biggest adventure of your life and a true quest to discover your own identity.

This is Destiny's Faith and in it lies Faith's destiny. Will the strange powers she seems born with and the help of the friends she meets along the way be enough? Only time will tell. Only one thing is certain: Faith's life will never be the same, neither will the future. Or the past, for that matter.

Length: Approx: 10hrs

Should be suitable for ages 13 and up

Original release Aug 1, 2014
